mapper.insert: insert into sada_reply(productId, memberId, content, rating) values(#{productId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{rating})
mapper.select: select replyId from sada_reply where memberId = #{memberId} and productId = #{productId}
mapper.update: update sada_reply set content = #{content}, rating = #{rating} where replyId = #{replyId}
